answers.author: Caitlyn Mitchell
answers.text:
Michigan Department of Transportation has a very helpful website for traffic and noise abatement. Attached is MDOT's packet of rules, policies and procedures related to road noise abatement. 
Here is a phone number for MDOT if you have more specific questions: (517) 322-6138 or the website is:
http://www.michigan.gov/mdot/0,1607,7-151-9621_11041_25846---,00.html
Hope it helps!

author: Jack Strain
text: Looking for example policies that set requirements for the installation of sound/privacy walls along public ROW using public tax dollars, i.e. arterial roads only, minimum vehicle trips per day on said abutting roads, cost sharing of abutting neighborhood, etc.
title: Sound/Privacy Walls Along Public ROW
